Package io.atomix.catalyst.serializer

Provides a fast serialization framework built on the Buffer abstraction.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CatalystSerializable
    Provides an interface for serializable types.
    SerializableTypeResolver
    The serializer type resolver is responsible for locating serializable types and their serializers.
    TypeSerializer<T>
    Provides custom object serialization.
    TypeSerializerFactory
    Serializer factory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultTypeSerializerFactory
    Default serializer factory.
    GenericJacksonSerializer
    Jackson serializer.
    GenericKryoSerializer
    Catalyst Kryo serializer.
    JdkTypeResolver
    JDK utilities type resolver.
    PrimitiveTypeResolver
    Primitive type resolver.
    Serializer
    Catalyst serializer.
    SerializerRegistry
    Serializer registry.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RegistrationException
    Registration exception.
    SerializationException
    Serialization exception.

Package io.atomix.catalyst.serializer Description

Provides a fast serialization framework built on the Buffer abstraction.
Author:
Jordan Halterman
